PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2019-00872019-02-08,  HC,  ,  , 
ActFood and Drugs Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Medical Devices Regulations (Updating ISO Standard)
PrecisRegulations Amending the MEDICAL DEVICES REGULATIONS (UPDATING INTERNATIONAL ORGANIZATION FOR STANDARDIZATION STANDARD) in order to update sections of the MEDICAL DEVICES REGULATIONS that refer to the ISO standard so that the most up to date international standard is referenced.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2019-0044 Publication Date: 2019-02-20
